title: EpicCraftingsPlus导致服务器后台报错
author: 神坑小弦
txt_content:
EpicCraftingsPlus导致服务器后台报错，有没有什么办法解决
19.10 13:20:52 [Server] WARN Task #361807 for EpicCraftingsPlus v4.5.2 generated an exception19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9-2019 06:35:28 Player: evilsym - Crafting: 海晶"19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65) ~[?:1.8.0_172]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at java.lang.Long.parseLong(Long.java:589) ~[?:1.8.0_172]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at java.lang.Long.valueOf(Long.java:803) ~[?:1.8.0_172]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at ecp.ajneb97.events.CheckCooldown.buscarJugadores(CheckCooldown.java:47) ~[?:?]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at ecp.ajneb97.events.CheckCooldown$1.run(CheckCooldown.java:28) ~[?:?]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:58) ~[paperspigot1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1095]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:356) [paperspigot1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1095]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:820) [paperspigot1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1095]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:403) [paperspigot1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1095]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:754) [paperspigot1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1095]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:652) [paperspigot1.11.2.jar:git-Paper-1095]19.10 13:20:52 [Server] INFO at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_172]

replies.txt_content:
数字格式化错误

玩家 evilsym 在合成 海晶 时，无法将 “9-2019” 转换为数字，修改你的配置。
